# Program Summary Report

This notebook creates a clean summary from tabular data, which can be rendered automatically with `rmarkdown::render()`.

```{r}
library(knitr)
library(dplyr)

df <- read.csv("report_summary.csv")
kable(df)
```

## Plot Scores

```{r}
library(ggplot2)

ggplot(df, aes(x=district, y=avg_score)) +
  geom_col(fill="orange") +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(title = "Average Program Score by District")
```
